programme.title: Charlie agus Lola
programme.desc: Is breá le Lola a bróga snasta dearga ach tá siad róbheag aici. (Lola's favourite red shiny shoes are too small for her.)

programme.title: Petronix Defenders
programme.desc: Tá frog órga gafa ag Peeves ach is cosúil gur frog contúirteach é. (Peeves captures a golden frog for Petswiper's party that turns out to be poisonous.)

programme.title: Banainmhithe
programme.desc: Déanann an bhuíon a ndícheall dea-ghiúmar a chur ar Ailfí. (The gang does their best to chase Alfie's bad mood away.)

programme.title: Angelo Rules
programme.desc: Cé acu - Angelo, Lola nó Sherwood - an laoch dá ndéanfaí scannán fúthu? (Who would be the hero in a film made about them: Angelo, Lola or Sherwood?)

programme.title: Angelo Rules
programme.desc: Baineann Angelo páirteanna as carr a thuismitheoirí chun dealbh mhór a dhéanamh. (Angelo creates a large sculpture out of parts from Mom and Dad's car.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Super Simple Amhráin
programme.desc: Amhrán spraíúil faoi bheannú do dhuine a bheidh againn inniu. (A fun song about saying Hello!)

programme.title: Blocuimhreacha
programme.desc: Casfaidh Fiche amhrán chun é féin a chur in aithne dúinn. (Twenty introduces himself with a song.)

programme.title: Blocdhathanna
programme.desc: Eagraíonn Corcra comórtas pátrúin. (Purple Organises a Pattern Competition.)

programme.title: CoComelon It's Cody Time
programme.desc: Tá athair Cody ag iarraidh deirfiúr óg Cody a chur a chodladh. (Cody's dad is trying to put Cody's baby sister to sleep.)

programme.title: CoComelon JJ's Animal
programme.desc: Haigh Didil, Didil an cat is an fhidil! (Hey Diddle, Diddle, it's the cat and the fiddle?!)

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Na céadfaí a bheidh faoi thrácht inniu: radharc, boladh, teagmháil, éisteacht agus blas. (The boy will explore the world with his 5 senses: sight, smell, touch, hearing and taste!)

programme.title: Scéal an Lae
programme.desc: Is í Síle Ní Chonghaile a bheidh ag léamh scéal an lae inniu. (Today's story of the day is read by Síle Ní Chonghaile.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Lá báistí atá ann agus tá péisteanna le bailiú! (A rainy day in the park means picking up worms!)

programme.title: Bígí ag Ceol
programme.desc: Daltaí Ghaelscoil Ultain i Muineachán a rachaidh i mbun pinn an tseachtain seo chun amhrán a chumadh faoi bhreacadh an lae. (Music series for children presented by John Sharpson.)

programme.title: Saol Faoi Shráid
programme.desc: Bhí an-lá ag Ribín ach bhí fíor-dhrochlá ag Glibín. Céard a tharla? (Ribín had an amazing day but poor Glibín had a terrible day. How could this be?)

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Tá ríméad ar George dul ag spraoi sa sneachta. (A blizzard covers the country house with a foot of snow and George can't wait to go outside and play.)

programme.title: Nuair a Bheidh Mé Mór
programme.desc: Samhlaíonn Ruarc a shaol ina aisteoir nuair a bheidh sé mór, le cúnamh ó Shióg na bPost. (Ruarc imagines his life as an actor when he grows up, with the help of the Job Fairy.)

programme.title: Daisy & Ollie
programme.desc: Téann Daisy chuig a céad tástáil súl agus míníonn an radharceolaí di faoi mar a dhéantar na súile a thástáil. (Daisy goes for her first eye test.)

programme.title: Deer Squad
programme.desc: Tá Lola ag iarraidh a carr, atá in ann eitilt, a thaispeáint don bhaile. (Lola looks to put up a show at the park in her flying car.)

programme.title: Ainmhithe Craiceáilte
programme.desc: Ar chlár an lae inniu, beidh madra ag spraoi san uisce, béar bán cairdiúil agus pearóid a sciobann spéaclaí a úinéara. (On today's programme we have a dog making a splash.)

programme.title: Comhrá
programme.desc: Is é Micheál Ó Ceadagáin as Cléire a bheidh ag comhrá le Máirtín Tom Sheáinín ar an gclár. (Máirtín Tom Sheáinín chats with Micheál Ó Ceadagáin from Cléire on the show.)

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: Níl aon chéad ag Daideo Kevin a charr a thabhairt leis níos mó agus mar sin socraíonn a charr a thabhairt do Kevin. (Grandpa Arnold struggles with his inability to drive.)

programme.title: Geantraí
programme.desc: Rinneadh taifeadadh ar an gclár seo in Wallis's Pub i Mainistir na Corann i gContae Chorcaí. (This episode of Geantraí comes from Wallis's Pub, Middleton, Co. Cork.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Faigheann Rose amach gur faoin gClár Tearmann Finné a cuireadh Miles go Miami. (Rose learns that her boyfriend Miles was relocated to Miami by the Witness Protection Program.)

programme.title: Murder She Wrote
programme.desc: Cuirtear i leith bleachtaire príobháideach gur dhúnmharaigh sé bainisteoir dornálaíochta. (A private investigator is accused of murdering a boxing manager.)

programme.title: Hup!
programme.desc: Ag Féile Con Cuirtin i mBrosnach, Contae Chiarraí, a bheifear ar chlár na seachtaine seo. (This week we visit Brosna, Co. Kerry for the Con Curtin traditional music festival.)

programme.title: Taste of Australia with Hayden Quinn
programme.desc: Tugann Hayden aghaidh ar an Yarra Valley chun slám úlla a phiocadh. (Hayden is off to the Yarra Valley to find some juicy apples.)

programme.title: Glór Tíre - Rogha & Togha
programme.desc: Is iad Louise Morrissey agus Donal Lyons a bheidh ar stáitse sa gclár seo. (Louise Morrissey and Donal Lyons give a fantastic performance on Glór Tíre.)

programme.title: Escape from the City
programme.desc: Tá Celia agus Pat tinn den árasán beag atá acu i Sydney. (Life in a cramped Sydney flat has Celia and Pat dreaming of the open spaces.)

programme.desc: Tá sé tábhachtach go dtabharfadh muid uilig aire don tsláinte. (It is important for everyone to take good care of their health!)

programme.title: Scéal an Lae
programme.desc: Is é Ruarc Ó Confhaola a bheidh ag léamh scéal an lae inniu. (Today's story of the day is read by Ruarc Ó Confhaola.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Tugann Pip agus Posy faoi deara go mbíonn an-spraoi acu ag obair le chéile. (Pip and Posy realise that working together is much more fun than competing against each other.)

programme.title: Bígí ag Ceol
programme.desc: Daltaí Ghaelscoil Chluain Dolcáin a rachaidh i mbun pinn an tseachtain seo chun amhrán a chumadh faoi laethanta saoire. (Music series for children presented by John Sharpson.)

programme.title: Saol Faoi Shráid
programme.desc: Cé atá ag salú na háite? Níl Glibín sásta ar chor ar bith. (Glibín wants to find out who's throwing rubbish everywhere.)

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Briseann George a chos san iarsmalann. (George breaks his leg at the museum.)

programme.title: Nuair a Bheidh Mé Mór
programme.desc: Samhlaíonn Muireann a saol ina láithreoir raidió nuair a bheidh sí mór. (Muireann imagines her life as a radio presenter with the help of the Job Fairy.)

programme.title: Daisy & Ollie
programme.desc: Téann Daisy agus Ollie chuig an bpáirc le Daide do Lá na Seirbhísí Éigeandála. (Daddy is taking Daisy and Ollie to the park for Emergency Services Day.)

programme.title: Deer Squad
programme.desc: Tá an tUasal Cruach ag iarraidh na crainn a laghdú chun an chuid deiridh den chathair a thógáil. (Sir Steel wants to shrink the trees to finish building the city.)

programme.title: Ainmhithe Craiceáilte
programme.desc: Ar chlár an lae inniu beidh madra ar ghluaisrothar agus madra eile atá i ngrá le hiasc. (Today we have a dog on a motorcycle and a bulldog falls in love with a fish.)

programme.title: Comhrá
programme.desc: Albert Fry, ceoltóir as Béal Feirste, a bheidh i mbun comhrá agus cainte le Máirtín Tom Sheáinín an t-seachtain seo. (Albert Fry a musician from Belfast will be today's guest on Comhrá.)

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: Tagann imní ar Jack faoi obair scoile Kevin. (Jack becomes concerned with Kevin's schoolwork.)

programme.title: Geantraí
programme.desc: Is i dteach tábhairne Tankers i Lios Tuathail i gContae Chiarraí a rinneadh taifeadadh ar an gclár seo. (Tankers Pub in Listowel, Co. Kerry is today's venue for Geantraí.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Ligeann Blanche uirthi féin gur léi féin a gariníon, Aurora. (Blanche pretends that her baby granddaughter Aurora is really her own child.)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Féachann Jessica lena chruthú nach raibh aon bhaint ag fear le dúnmharú a tharla tríocha bliain roimhe sin. (Jessica tries to prove a man is innocent in a 30-year old murder case.)

programme.title: Sloinne
programme.desc: Tá rún ag Rónán Mac Gearailt níos mó a fháil amach faoina shloinne. (Rónán Mac Gearailt looks to find out more about his surname.)

programme.title: Grand Tours of Scotland
programme.desc: Téann an staraí Paul Murton ar thuras mórthimpeall na hAlban. (Historian Paul Murton bring us on a grand tour of Scotland.)

programme.title: Glór Tíre - Rogha & Togha
programme.desc: Súil siar ar réaltaí móra an cheoil a bhí ar stáitse i Sraith 8. (A compilation of the best performances from Glór Tíre Series 8, first broadcast in 2011.)

programme.title: Escape from the City
programme.desc: Tá a hárasán in Sydney díolta ag Christine agus tá rún aici bogadh amach faoin tuath. (Christine has sold her two-bedroom apartment in Sydney and decided to head to the bush.)

programme.title: An Aimsir Láithreach
programme.desc: Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

programme.title: Ar Scáth na Sléibhte
programme.desc: Leanfaidh Cormac lena thuras i Sléibhte Mhuintir Luinigh in Ulaidh. (Cormac examines the rich Irish language heritage of the Muintir Luinigh area in Ulster.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Ligeann Blanche uirthi féin gur léi féin a gariníon, Aurora. (Blanche pretends that her baby granddaughter Aurora is really her own child.)

programme.title: Nuacht TG4
programme.desc: Mórimeachtaí an lae ó Aonad Nuachta TG4. (The day's main news stories from a regional, national and international perspective.)

programme.title: Bliain in Inis Oírr
programme.desc: Bíonn neart ag tarlú ar an oileán san earrach agus sa samhradh. (Spring on Inis Oírr and the island bristles with new life, activity and a special birthday.)

programme.title: 7 Lá
programme.desc: Clár cúrsaí reatha seachtainiúil TG4. Déanfar scagadh agus plé ar scéalta nuachta atá go mór i mbéal an phobail. (Politics and the economy, regional, national and international affairs.)

programme.title: Ros na Rún
programme.desc: Bíonn ionadh ar Berni nuair a fhaigheann sí amach gurb í Aisling a chur fios ar na Gardaí. (Berni is astonished when she learns that it was Aisling who called the Gardaí on her.)

programme.title: Glór Tíre Rogha & Togha
programme.desc: Beidh TR Dallas agus Gerry Carroll ag gabháil fhoinn ar chlár na hoíche anocht. (Tonight's show stars TR Dallas and Gerry Carroll.)

programme.title: Nashville, seo muid ag teacht!
programme.desc: Fiosraíonn Diane Cannon an chúis a dtugtar Music City ar Nashville. (Singer Diane Cannon discovers why Nashville deserves the title Music City.)

programme.title: Better Call Saul
programme.desc: Tá Jimmy ar tí tabhairt faoi jab nua fad a bhíonn Mike ag tarraingt achrainn. (A restless Jimmy embarks on a new endeavour while Mike burns bridges.)

programme.title: Fíorscéal
programme.desc: Déantar cur síos ar antasubstaint ar féidir a úsáid chun galair a leigheas sa gclár faisnéise seo. (This is the story of an antibody at the heart of medical innovation.)

programme.title: Macallaí Dhomhnach na Fola
programme.desc: Clár ceoil in ómós don cheithre fhear déag a maraíodh le linn shlad Dhomhnach na Fola 1972. (A musical commemoration on the 50th anniversary of Derry's Bloody Sunday.)
